backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the loan document backend, implementing user profile management, global/custom template CRUD, document storage, and loan processing records with role-based access control via AccessControl and MixinAuthorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report confirming that the Template Designer UI entry point was removed from App.tsx without deleting the TemplateDesigner component or its data.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summary file describing the purpose and key changes of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for the light and dark color themes including background, foreground, primary, sidebar, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Vite app, setting the page title to 'Loan Document Generator' and mounting the React app at the #root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React application component that wires together the loan form, PDF generation/download/share logic, and template hooks; the Advanced Template Designer dialog/button has been removed while the TemplateDesigner import is retained via a void reference.
frontend/src/components/FormSection.tsx: Loan form UI component handling applicant details, loan parameters, bank account fields, custom fields, EMI auto-calculation, and document download/share actions using the Template type for customTemplates.
frontend/src/components/preview/Template: Renders optional visual overlays (background image, watermark text, seal, and signature) on top of a document preview based on template configuration.
frontend/src/components/PreviewDialog.ts: Renders a modal dialog that previews a filled document template, applying rich formatting (highlighted financial values, bold labels, watermarks, headers/footers) to the rendered template body.
frontend/src/components/TemplateDesigner: A UI component for creating, editing, and saving both built-in and custom document templates, with tabs per template, live preview, and backend persistence support.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A React hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using the current Internet Identity, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an Internet Identity authentication context and hook, managing login/logout state via DFINITY's AuthClient and exposing identity, status flags, and login/clear functions.
A generic React hook that synchronizes a state value with localStorage, initializing from stored data and persisting updates automatically.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating custom templates on the ICP backend, including get-all, get-by-id, add, and update operations with structured error handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useTemplates.ts: Custom React hook that manages both built-in and custom document templates, handling local state, localStorage persistence, and backend synchronization via React Query mutations. Includes serialization/deserialization helpers for storing full Template objects as JSON inside a GlobalMasterTemplate backend type.
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS entry point that sets up Tailwind directives and defines CSS custom properties for a warm orange/amber color palette in both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/download.ts: Utility function that triggers a browser file download by creating a temporary anchor element from a Blob URL.
frontend/src/lib/loan/calculateEmi.ts: Provides a function to calculate monthly EMI using the standard amortization formula and a helper to format numbers as Indian Rupee currency strings.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/generatePdf.ts: Generates a minimal valid PDF file by rendering a document to a canvas as JPEG and embedding it into a hand-crafted raw PDF structure without external libraries. Includes template resolution logic for both built-in and custom document types.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/layout.ts: Defines A4 page dimension constants at 96 DPI including margins, header height, footer height, and the usable content area rectangle.
frontend/src/lib/pdf/renderDocumentToCan: Renders a loan document onto an HTML Canvas element by compositing a background, watermark, Bajaj Finance header/footer images, document content text, and signature/stamp elements in sequence.
frontend/src/lib/shareUtils.ts: Utility that attempts to share a PDF Blob via the Web Share API and falls back gracefully if sharing is unsupported or fails.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/fileToDa: Converts an image File object to a base64 data URL using FileReader, rejecting non-image files.
frontend/src/lib/templateAssets/position: Maps a PositionPreset enum to CSS style objects for UI rendering and to x/y pixel coordinates for canvas drawing, supporting five preset positions with a margin.
frontend/src/lib/templates/getTemplate.t: Defines default built-in templates for three loan document types and provides utilities to retrieve, normalize, and persist custom templates via localStorage.
frontend/src/lib/templates/renderTemplat: Renders a document template by replacing placeholder tokens (e.g. {{name}}, {{loanAmount}}, custom fields) with actual form data values, returning the processed headline and body strings.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Validates loan form data, returning an array of error messages for missing or invalid fields such as name, loan amount, interest rate, year, and processing charge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/types/form.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and types for form data, including CustomField, LoanType union, FormData structure, and DocumentType union.
frontend/src/types/templates.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for template configuration including Template, CustomTemplate, and settings for background, watermark, logo, seal, and signature elements.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routes, with sessionStorage fallback support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom theme tokens (colors via OKLCH, fonts, border radius, shadows, animations) and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata tracking existing features and a pending request to remove the Template Designer UI entry point from the application without modifying underlying template code.
